page.title: 07Newburgh - Sports Clubs
page.content: There are many sports clubs in Newburgh. There are two football clubs called the{Newburgh Juveniles}who play in the Riverside Park and the{Newburgh {Juniors}who play in the East Shore Park. A{sailing club}is situated on the River Tay just up from the football pitches. There are many people who are members and have their boats in the boating club's paddock. It attracts many visitors of all kinds from water skiers and speed fanatics to rowers and rowing boats. There is a{Bowling Club}on the outskirts of Newburgh. There are a maximum of 180 members in the Bowling Club. There are six rinks,a bar and a locker room where the members keep their bowls and shoes. During the season the rinks are always full.
